conversation.content: Hi there! You want to know about the Taj Mahal?
The Taj Mahal is a famous building. It's in India. It's a tomb.
A tomb is a building where a dead person is buried. The Taj Mahal is the tomb of a woman named Mumtaz Mahal.
Mumtaz Mahal was the wife of a king named Shah Jahan. She died in 1631. The king loved her very much. He built the Taj Mahal for her. It's a symbol of their love.
That's so romantic! When was the Taj Mahal built?
The Taj Mahal was built from 1632 to 1653. It took a long time to finish. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
